net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy

Class VarianceReductionQueryStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.querystrategy.AbstractQueryStrategy
      • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy.AbstractSingleLabelQueryStrategy
        • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy.VarianceReductionQueryStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, IQueryStrategy, JCLAL

    public class VarianceReductionQueryStrategy
extends AbstractSingleLabelQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Variance Reduction query strategy. It reduces generalization error indirectly by minimizing output variance. Burr Settles. Active Learning Literature Survey. Computer Sciences Technical Report 1648, University of Wisconsinâ€“Madison. 2009.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Maria del Carmen Rodriguez Hernandez, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:

    • Field Detail

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • factorRegularization

        private double factorRegularization
        It adds to matrixFisher: (the matrix Identity for the regularization factor) The regularization factor influences enormously the algorithm. A high value zooms in the precision or accuracy. There comes a moment in which the increase of the variable does not improve the precision.

      • epsilon

        private double epsilon
        Epsilon it affects in the quantity of iterations of the algorithm. A low value guarantees several iterations. The variable alone does not improve the precision or accuracy. The variable merged with the factor of regularization (FR) improves the algorithm. The algorithm with high value of FR and under value of epsilon it is better that the algorithm with alone high value of FR.

      • maxEpsilonIteration

        private int maxEpsilonIteration
        To control the iterations that are realized internally on having tried to find differences minor than epsilon.

      • currentEpsilonIteration

        private int currentEpsilonIteration
        To control the iterations that are realized internally on having tried to find differences minor than epsilon.

      • tempValues

        To optimization.

      • unlabelledSize

        private int unlabelledSize
        To control temporary values used for optimization.
